title: Crown her already
author: VD
content_html:
It seems at least one editor at National Review can’t wait to see a female president:

…what if a little down the line, John McCain asked Joe Lieberman to be his running mate?

You see, this is why I said it would take a defeat in 2008 to fully open Three Monkeys eyes. How anyone could imagine that moving the Republican Party further to the Left will do anything but ensure Bush-Clinton IV is beyond me.
